name: A tsikoudia a day keeps the doctor away!
description: The beauty of the picturesque Old Town of Chania, where our Triip will take place, unfolds as we explore the numerous tiny alleys and the crescent shape of the stunning Old Venetian Harbour, before enjoying our delicious meal at any of the finest spots in Town. The tour is flexible and can be adjusted to your will, diet preferences and...appetite! Excellent restaurants, traditional fish tavernas or cosy vegetarian eateries - all best of their kind - are of your choice and will amaze you with the original taste of Crete they offer.
